definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...

sentences.english: Thanks to my shake-proof shoes, I can still stand and sit here.
sentences.chinese: 多亏了我的防震鞋，我还能站在你面前做着在这里。

sentences.english: Thanks to the cracks, the fish in the lake don't die from the lack of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 也多亏了裂缝，湖里的鱼才不会缺氧致死。

sentences.english: Thanks to Jeff, I'm still able to afford him.
sentences.chinese: 多亏了杰夫，让我还能养得起这熊孩子。

sentences.english: Thank goodness my company will let me reimburse all this.
sentences.chinese: 上帝，多亏公司可以让我报销这些费用。

sentences.english: Thanks to the magic of the Internet, you can watch the trick again.
sentences.chinese: 多亏有了互联网的魔力，你可以再看看这个戏法。

sentences.english: Jean： But thanks to you guys, government is loosing money because more money needs to be spent to put out the fire.
sentences.chinese: 可多亏了你们，政府也在赔钱。

sentences.english: He owes his life to a kindhearted man.
sentences.chinese: 多亏一位好心人他才活了下来。

sentences.english: Too hung, locust tree really surprised out in a cold sweat, thanks to the file didnt hand over to.
sentences.chinese: 太悬了，槐树着实惊出一身冷汗，多亏文件没交出去。

sentences.english: Thanks to his help. I finished it successfully.
sentences.chinese: 多亏了他的帮助，我成功地完成了这个项目。

sentences.english: Thank to good old USA just keep on made China rich. Chine need taxes break.
sentences.chinese: 多亏美国让中国变得富裕了，中国需要税收突破。

sentences.english: Thanks to a good teacher, she passed the exam.
sentences.chinese: 多亏有位好老师，她才通过了考试。

sentences.english: Thanks to modern machinery, production is outrunning consumption.
sentences.chinese: 多亏有了现代化的机器，使生产超过了消费。

sentences.english: Thanks to the doctor, I am safe and sound once again.
sentences.chinese: 多亏了那位大夫，我现在才又安然无恙了。

sentences.english: Thanks to the teacher, I have made great progress in my physics.
sentences.chinese: 多亏老师的帮助，我在物理课上取得了较大的进步。

sentences.english: Thanks to your cooperation, everything is going well.
sentences.chinese: 多亏您的合作，一切进展得很顺利。

sentences.english: Its numbers have doubled, also due to reintroduction efforts.
sentences.chinese: 它的数量已经翻倍，这也是多亏了野外放生。

definition: if it were not for/but for
Thank heavens!/Thank goodness that's worked out so well!
to profit from a disaster (idiom); some good comes out of a setback/It's an ill wind that blows nobody any good.
to bother/to press sb, usu. to do sth/it's a tough job/sorry to bother you (polite, used to thank sb for a favor)
one is bound for good fortune after surviving a great disaster (proverb)
pinyin: da4 nan4 bu4 si3 , bi4 you3 hou4 fu2
